name: Meeting Prep AI Assistant
description: Automates pre-meeting research and brief creation using modular AI agents.

business_team_1.name: Meeting Preparation Team
business_team_1.description: Coordinates all tasks related to gathering, analyzing, and delivering contextual meeting briefs.

agent_1.name: CRM Fetcher Agent
agent_1.description: Retrieves historical interaction logs, call notes, and task history from CRM.

tool_1.name: REST Client
tool_1.description: Fetches data from external or internal CRM systems.

api_1.name: Fetch CRM Data API
api_1.description: Retrieves CRM context such as notes and history.

agent_2.name: News Intel Agent
agent_2.description: Gathers recent news, funding updates, and market movements about the company.

tool_1.name: REST Client
tool_1.description: Calls public news APIs and filters relevant headlines.

api_1.name: Fetch Company News API
api_1.description: Fetches news based on company and industry context.

agent_3.name: Stakeholder Profiler Agent
agent_3.description: Summarizes the role, background, and public posts of each meeting attendee.

tool_1.name: Transformer
tool_1.description: Processes profile and social data using transformer-based NLP models.

agent_4.name: Meeting Objective Agent
agent_4.description: Parses internal objectives and aligns them with meeting context (e.g., close deal, support issue).

tool_1.name: If-Else / Await
tool_1.description: Analyzes internal notes and logic-driven meeting goals.

api_1.name: Extract Meeting Objectives API
api_1.description: Extracts and contextualizes objectives from internal systems.

agent_5.name: Brief Composer Agent
agent_5.description: Consolidates all inputs into a structured meeting brief using GPT or templates.

tool_1.name: GPT + Python Formatter
tool_1.description: Generates role-specific meeting briefs with structured formatting.

api_1.name: Compose Meeting Brief API
api_1.description: Creates a structured meeting brief document.

agent_6.name: Delivery Agent
agent_6.description: Sends or uploads the brief to a calendar event, email, or document system.

tool_1.name: REST Client / Await
tool_1.description: Delivers generated content to appropriate end systems.

api_1.name: Deliver Brief API
api_1.description: Schedules or delivers the brief through the selected channel.
